subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Joaquim Rodríguez held just a one-second lead over Alberto Contador after finishing seventh in the time trial in the Spanish Vuelta.
snippet: Joaquim Rodríguez held just a one-second lead over Alberto Contador after finishing seventh in the time trial in the Spanish Vuelta.
